feed.title: A bitcoin UDP P2P protocol extension

entry.title: A bitcoin UDP P2P protocol extension
entry.summary: The person expressing themselves in the context has been a fan of SCTP for years but has never seen it being used anywhere. They inquire about any examples of where it has been used, to which someone responds that firewall practices tend to put a damper on cool new protocols like SCTP. The person agrees and admits being a bit old fashioned.
